text: La Tajidu Qawmaan Yu'uminuna Billahi Wa Al-Yawmi Al-'Akhiri Yuwadduna Man Hadda Allaha Wa Rasulahu Wa Law Kanu 'Aba'ahum 'Aw 'Abna'ahum 'Aw 'Ikhwanahum 'Aw `Ashiratahum 'Ula'ika Kataba Fi Qulubihimu Al-'Imana Wa 'Ayyadahum Biruhin Minhu Wa Yudkhiluhum Jannatin Tajri Min Tahtiha Al-'Anharu Khalidina Fiha Rađiya Allahu `Anhum Wa Rađu `Anhu 'Ula'ika Hizbu Allahi 'Ala 'Inna Hizba Allahi Humu Al-Muflihuna
